page.shortlink: api objects datacache gridcache object GetKeyForGuid method
page.description: Get the item key for a guid key

argument.name: GuidKey
argument.description: A guid string or guid for an item key in the cache. For internal use only.

page.discussion:
Check the CallResult for success or not. If successful, CallResult.ReturnDataValue will have the item key.
datacache,logical,number
